name: essence-core
description: Essence Core - libs for Essence components.
author: Hetmann W. Iohan <wilhelm.hetmann@evozon.com>

scripts.babel: babel --presets react,es2015 src --out-dir lib; cd src; find . \( -name '*.less' -o -name '*.eot' -o -name '*.svg' -o -name '*.ttf' -o -name '*.woff' \)  -print0  | cpio -0pdmu ../lib; cd ../;
